page.title: 02ROLLS ROYCE TRANSPORT
page.content: There are{60 lorries, 30 vans, 20 {cars}and{2 mini_coaches}based at the depot. The{lorries}are used for {collecting }aero_engine parts from sub_contractors and{delivering completed engines to aircraft manufacturers. The{cars}take{managers and{visitors}to Rolls Royce factories and the{mini-coaches}transport{staff. There are{62 people}working at the depot,{40 drivers}and the rest {mechanics}and{office staff. The{lorries}are serviced every{1,000 {miles}and altogether the fleet travels over{500,000 miles}(1/2 million miles) every year.The{largest}and{heaviest loads they carry are{RB211 engines which weigh{6 tonnes}each.
